meanings.def: having knowledge or skill in a particular job or activity
examples: experienced in something She's highly experienced in software development.
experienced in doing something He's very experienced in looking after animals.
The staff are all highly experienced.
The task needs the skills of a suitably experienced engineer.
a widely experienced and articulate politician

meanings.def: having knowledge as a result of doing something for a long time, or having had a lot of different experiences
examples: She's very young and not very experienced.
an experienced traveller (= somebody who has travelled a lot)
She was more mature, more experienced.
